alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 10:16PM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500 Feet, Teller County and Pikes Peak, and Northern El Paso County. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel on Interstate 25 over Monument Hill could be hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
